response.overview: Miracle at St. Anna chronicles the story of four American soldiers who are members of the all-black 92nd "Buffalo Soldier" Division stationed in Tuscany, Italy during World War II.
response.tagline: World War II had its heroes and its miracles.
response.title: Miracle at St. Anna

cast.name: Steve Forrest
cast.character: Capt. Harding in The Longest Day (archive footage) (uncredited)

cast.name: Stuart Whitman
cast.character: Lt. Sheen in The Longest Day (archive footage) (uncredited)
